comment.text: This translation key is used to display a label for pending invitations. It appears as a button title and will be displayed when an invitation is pending review or approval. The translator should provide a clear and concise phrase that communicates the status of the invitation in a user-friendly manner.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Uitnodigingen in afwachting' is grammatically correct, it's a rather literal and formal translation of "Pending invite". A more natural and concise Dutch translation would be 'Wachtende uitnodigingen' or 'Openstaande uitnodigingen'.

The translation 'අවලංගු ආරාධනය' while literally translatable, doesn't perfectly convey the meaning of 'Pending invite'. 'Pending' implies a state of waiting. A more accurate translation would consider this nuance.

The translation 'Чекање на позивницу' while technically correct, is a bit literal and can be improved for naturalness. A more common and idiomatic Serbian (Cyrillic) translation for 'Pending invite' would be 'Очекује се позивница' or 'Почечено чекање позивнице'.

While "Čekanje na pozivnicu" is understandable, a more direct and common translation of 'Pending invite' would be 'Neočekivana pozivnica' or 'Pričekuje se pozivnica'. "Čekanje na pozivnicu" is a bit verbose and not the most natural phrasing.
While 'Lời mời đang chờ xử lý' is understandable, it's a bit verbose and formal for a pending invite notification. A more natural and concise translation would be preferable.
